user_bio:
Automation specialist helping businesses eliminate manual work using n8n and AI-powered workflows.
I design custom automations that connect tools like Google Calendar, Airtable, GPT, Supabase, and internal systems turning scattered processes into streamlined operations.
From invoice processing to CRM automation and scheduling systems, I build scalable solutions that save time, reduce errors, and increase efficiency.
Helping SMBs work smarter without needing a full tech team.
